reviewText:
A useful shop idea resource and reference.  Several projects included are already on my "To-Do" list.

Sadly, the format is a little disjointed as it's a collection of previous published material.  It's nice to have all the info in one place, but the interface and organization could use some work.

The interface is archaic by current standards.  Would get another star if natively usable by tablet computers like Galaxy and iPad.
